title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 13 November 2015 - XWiki
content:
<Slashman> has quit  
05:54 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
06:02 <Denis> has quit  
06:02 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
07:03 <Ramona1> has joined #xwiki  
07:43 <Ramona1> has quit

08:22 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki

08:39 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
09:13 <kais3n> has joined #xwiki  
09:19 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
09:50 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
09:55 <msmeria1> has joined #xwiki  
09:56 <msmeria> has quit  
10:05 <Trefex> has joined #xwiki  
10:37 <Bugendolf> has quit  
10:49 <cjd> has quit  
10:50 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
11:14 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
11:14 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
11:20 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
13:14 <vmassol> msmeria1 / ramona: windows issue fixed now :)  
13:14 <vmassol> note the workaround mentioned in the RN: http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotesXWiki73  
13:15 <vmassol> (you need to install xwiki in a non read-only directory for 7.3)  
13:15 <Ramona2> has joined #xwiki  
13:15 <Ramona2> Great :)  
13:16 <msmeria1> vmassol: thanks :)  
13:16 <msmeria1> is now known as <msmeria>  
13:59 <evalica> has quit  
15:04 <MasterPiece> has joined #xwiki  
15:20 <Ramona2> has quit  
16:09 <OSIMasson> has joined #xwiki  
16:14 <msmeria> has quit  
16:18 <tmortagne> fun, I closed http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-2460 just now  
16:19 <tmortagne> looks like we have cleanup to do in improvement/newfeature issues  
16:22 <vmassol> yes I don't think we've really cleaned this….  
16:22 <vmassol> (at least not to the max)  
16:25 <cjd> Just mass close them with "Spring Cleaning" as the comment  
16:28 <vmassol> or simply remove jira.xwiki.org  
16:29 <vmassol> easier  
16:34 <cjd> :D  
16:34 <vmassol> oh wait that reminds me of something :)  
16:34 <vmassol> some project called cjdns I think  
16:35 <cjd> hm never heard of it  
16:35 <cjd> sounds crappy  
16:35 <vmassol> yep, a project with no issue tracker!  
16:35 <vmassol> cannot be of good quality for sure  
16:35 <vmassol> :)  
16:36 <cjd> Well.. it doesn't have any bugs  
16:37 <cjd> I vote for setting the capcha for joining jira to be this: http://crapcha.com/  
16:37 <vmassol> :)  
16:37 <vmassol> nice  
16:37 <vmassol> less users reporting issues => project has less bugs!  
16:37 <cjd> Sounds Logical  
16:40 <OSIMasson1> has joined #xwiki  
16:41 <OSIMasson> has left #xwiki  
16:41 <vmassol> org.xwiki.zipexplorer or org.xwiki.zip for the new  code for the new zip explorer package?  
16:42 <vmassol> (hesitating)  
16:42 <vmassol> zip is more generic and allows to put more stuff related to zips in the future  
16:43 <vmassol> actually I wanted to put the new code in xwiki-platform-zipexplorer but I could put it in xwiki-platform-zip  
16:43 <vmassol> (will make it easier to deprecated and remove the zipexplorer in the future)  
16:43 <vmassol> wdyt?  
16:44 <cjd> o.x.zip  
16:44 <vmassol> OTOH it maye be too generic  
16:44 <vmassol> \*may  
16:44 <cjd> it's really just for collision avoidance in the end  
16:45 <OSIMasson1> has quit  
16:45 <vmassol> ok I'll do xwiki-plarform-zip with ZipExplorerManager and ZipScriptService  
16:46 <OSIMasson1> has joined #xwiki  
16:47 <OSIMasson1> has quit  
16:47 <cjd> ZipExplorerManager ?   We have \*multiple\* ZipExplorers ?  
16:47 <cjd> and they need managing?  
16:47 <vmassol> yeah I can use ZipExplorer  
16:49 <OSIMasson1> has joined #xwiki  
16:49 <cjd> I find that name components which describe attributes of a thing   "Factory" -> it's singleton   etc are not good for describing it  
16:49 <cjd> but then I sometimes go to sillyness to explain what a thing actually does  
16:50 <cjd> But anyway cute names are at least memorable  
17:22 <kais3n> has quit  
17:24 <OSIMasson1> has quit  
17:24 <vmassol> mflorea and all: if we find blocker issues I think we should report them in an error box in the release notes, WDYT?  
17:25 <vmassol> (thinking about http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-12818 )  
17:25 <OSIMasson1> has joined #xwiki  
17:31 <vmassol> actually let me try something  
17:44 <KermitTheFragger> has quit  
17:49 <vmassol> done  
18:04 <tmortagne> has quit  
18:10 <cjd> has quit  
18:15 <vmassol> ClemensR: cool for http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/MaximalUploadSizeAdminUI :)  
18:16 <ClemensR> except I bugged it up ;)  
18:16 <vmassol> (a screenshot would be awesome too!)  
18:16 <vmassol> haha  
18:16 <vmassol> :)  
18:16 <ClemensR> attached the wrong version  
18:16 <vmassol> :)  
18:16 <ClemensR> screenshots upcoming after I sort out my chaos version  
18:16 <vmassol> k  
18:17 <vmassol> (minor: you could also update the title)  
18:17 <ClemensR> it is actually two lines of code, and could be even less if extenzin could attach objects to existing pages  
18:18 <ClemensR> darn this title  
18:18 <ClemensR> I guess I have to rename the page instead  
18:18 <vmassol> we should probably have this by default in the platform...  
18:18 <vmassol> no you can just change the title  
18:18 <vmassol> what you prefer  
18:22 <ClemensR> rename didnt help, but object editor is the best editor :D  
18:22 <vmassol> yep  
18:27 <vmassol> ClemensR: a small improvement would be to have a hint explaining what this is more precisely (why it needs to be set) and the unit of the figure entered :)  
18:27 <ClemensR> I think I did  
18:28 <vmassol> ah was just looking at screenshots  
18:28 <vmassol> and coudn't see it  
18:28 <ClemensR> one moment, I am not finished anyway, now screenshots  
18:28 <vmassol> ok ok  
18:28 <vmassol> maybe you have new screenhosts  
18:28 <vmassol> I haven't seen  
18:28 <vmassol> the hint I mentioned is for XWiki's UI not the doc ;)  
18:30 <ClemensR> ah, in the UI itself, ok  
18:30 <ClemensR> but then it is no longer pure code, but mingled with content :D  
18:31 <ClemensR> er, I try to add it, one moment  
18:33 <Trefex> has quit  
18:34 <OSIMasson1> has quit  
18:37 <OSIMasson1> has joined #xwiki  
18:39 <ClemensR> narf, I remember there is a helper to flush the "extensions" cache (by tmortagne?), but Icannot find it. could use it right now  ...  
18:40 <Pbas> has quit  
18:40 <ClemensR> ah, found  it:  "Extension Tweak"  :)  
18:40 <ClemensR> "Provide various tools to manipulate extensions (usually in a not very clean way)" exactly what I need  
18:46 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
18:47 <ClemensR> ok, finished (I hope ;)  
18:55 <Ramona1> has joined #xwiki
